channel.title: Code?

item.title: Code?
item.dc:creator: @oniscape oniscape
item.description:
@oniscape wrote:

[code]case 208:
// Enter Amounth Part 2

int EnteredAmount = inStream.readDWord();
if (EnteredAmount < 1) {
	break;
}

if(attackskill) {
	if (EnteredAmount > 99) {
		EnteredAmount = 99;
	}
	equalSkillXP(getXPForLevel(EnteredAmount + 1),0);
	playerLevel[0] = EnteredAmount;
	attackskill = false;
	updateRequired = true;
	appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	refreshSkills();
	break;
}
if(defenceskill) {
	if (EnteredAmount > 99) {
		EnteredAmount = 99;
	}
	equalSkillXP(getXPForLevel(EnteredAmount + 1),1);
	playerLevel[1] = EnteredAmount;
	defenceskill = false;
	updateRequired = true;
	appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	refreshSkills();
	break;
}
if(strengthskill) {
	if (EnteredAmount > 99) {
		EnteredAmount = 99;
	}
	equalSkillXP(getXPForLevel(EnteredAmount + 1),2);
	playerLevel[2] = EnteredAmount;
	strengthskill = false;
	updateRequired = true;
	appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	refreshSkills();
	break;
}
if(rangeskill) {
	if (EnteredAmount > 99) {
		EnteredAmount = 99;
	}
	equalSkillXP(getXPForLevel(EnteredAmount + 1),4);
	playerLevel[4] = EnteredAmount;
	rangeskill = false;
	updateRequired = true;
	appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	refreshSkills();
	break;
}
if(mageskill) {
	if (EnteredAmount > 99) {
		EnteredAmount = 99;
	}
	equalSkillXP(getXPForLevel(EnteredAmount + 1),6);
	playerLevel[6] = EnteredAmount;
	mageskill = false;
	updateRequired = true;
	appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	refreshSkills();
	break;
}
if(prayerskill) {
	if (EnteredAmount > 99) {
		EnteredAmount = 99;
	}
	equalSkillXP(getXPForLevel(EnteredAmount + 1),5);
	playerLevel[5] = EnteredAmount;
	prayerskill = false;
	updateRequired = true;
	appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	refreshSkills();
	break;
}
if(healthskill) {
	if (EnteredAmount > 99) {
		EnteredAmount = 99;
	}
	equalSkillXP(getXPForLevel(EnteredAmount + 1),3);
	playerLevel[3] = EnteredAmount;
	mageskill = false;
	updateRequired = true;
	appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	refreshSkills();
	break;
}
if(runecraftskill) {
	if (EnteredAmount > 99) {
		EnteredAmount = 99;
	}
	equalSkillXP(getXPForLevel(EnteredAmount + 1),0);
	playerLevel[0] = EnteredAmount;
	runecraftskill = false;
	updateRequired = true;
	appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	refreshSkills();
	break;
}
if(agiltyskill) {
	if (EnteredAmount > 99) {
		EnteredAmount = 99;
	}
	equalSkillXP(getXPForLevel(EnteredAmount + 1),1);
	playerLevel[1] = EnteredAmount;
	agiltyskill = false;
	updateRequired = true;
	appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	refreshSkills();
	break;
}
if(herbloreskill) {
	if (EnteredAmount > 99) {
		EnteredAmount = 99;
	}
	equalSkillXP(getXPForLevel(EnteredAmount + 1),2);
	playerLevel[2] = EnteredAmount;
	herbloreskill = false;
	updateRequired = true;
	appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	refreshSkills();
	break;
}
if(thievingskill) {
	if (EnteredAmount > 99) {
		EnteredAmount = 99;
	}
	equalSkillXP(getXPForLevel(EnteredAmount + 1),4);
	playerLevel[4] = EnteredAmount;
	thievingskill = false;
	updateRequired = true;
	appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	refreshSkills();
	break;
}
if(craftingskill) {
	if (EnteredAmount > 99) {
		EnteredAmount = 99;
	}
	equalSkillXP(getXPForLevel(EnteredAmount + 1),6);
	playerLevel[6] = EnteredAmount;
	craftingskill = false;
	updateRequired = true;
	appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	refreshSkills();
	break;
}
iffletchingskill) {
	if (EnteredAmount > 99) {
		EnteredAmount = 99;
	}
	equalSkillXP(getXPForLevel(EnteredAmount + 1),5);
	playerLevel[5] = EnteredAmount;
	fletchingskill = false;
	updateRequired = true;
	appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	refreshSkills();
	break;
}
if(slayerskill) {
	if (EnteredAmount > 99) {
		EnteredAmount = 99;
	}
	equalSkillXP(getXPForLevel(EnteredAmount + 1),3);
	playerLevel[3] = EnteredAmount;
	slayerskill = false;
	updateRequired = true;
	appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	refreshSkills();
	break;
}
if(miningskill) {
	if (EnteredAmount > 99) {
		EnteredAmount = 99;
	}
	equalSkillXP(getXPForLevel(EnteredAmount + 1),0);
	playerLevel[0] = EnteredAmount;
	miningskill = false;
	updateRequired = true;
	appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	refreshSkills();
	break;
}
if(smithingskill) {
	if (EnteredAmount > 99) {
		EnteredAmount = 99;
	}
	equalSkillXP(getXPForLevel(EnteredAmount + 1),1);
	playerLevel[1] = EnteredAmount;
	smithingskill = false;
	updateRequired = true;
	appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	refreshSkills();
	break;
}
if(fishingskill) {
	if (EnteredAmount > 99) {
		EnteredAmount = 99;
	}
	equalSkillXP(getXPForLevel(EnteredAmount + 1),2);
	playerLevel[2] = EnteredAmount;
	fishingskill = false;
	updateRequired = true;
	appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	refreshSkills();
	break;
}
if(cookingskill) {
	if (EnteredAmount > 99) {
		EnteredAmount = 99;
	}
	equalSkillXP(getXPForLevel(EnteredAmount + 1),4);
	playerLevel[4] = EnteredAmount;
	cookingskill = false;
	updateRequired = true;
	appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	refreshSkills();
	break;
}
if(firemakingskill) {
	if (EnteredAmount > 99) {
		EnteredAmount = 99;
	}
	equalSkillXP(getXPForLevel(EnteredAmount + 1),6);
	playerLevel[6] = EnteredAmount;
	firemakingskill = false;
	updateRequired = true;
	appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	refreshSkills();
	break;
}
if(woodcuttingskill) {
	if (EnteredAmount > 99) {
		EnteredAmount = 99;
	}
	equalSkillXP(getXPForLevel(EnteredAmount + 1),5);
	playerLevel[5] = EnteredAmount;
	woodcuttingskill = false;
	updateRequired = true;
	appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	refreshSkills();
	break;
}
if(farmingskill) {
	if (EnteredAmount > 99) {
		EnteredAmount = 99;
	}
	equalSkillXP(getXPForLevel(EnteredAmount + 1),3);
	playerLevel[3] = EnteredAmount;
	farmingskill = false;
	updateRequired = true;
	appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	refreshSkills();
	break;
}

break;[/code]

Theres the fixed version.
